title: You Will Find Pure Luxury at the Residences of Dockside
description:
You will find Pure Luxury at The Residences of Dockside right on the waterfront with this amazing Corner unit, NORTH FACING condo with center city views, 2 Garage Parking spots, and storage. This TOTALLY RENOVATED 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom condo of nearly 2000 sq ft offers some of the finest elements starting with the highly sought-after open floorplan, pristine hardwood floors throughout, a gourmet kitchen, custom fitted California walk-in closet and is book-ended by terraces and breathtaking views. The expansive Main Bedroom Suite features beautiful hardwood floors, LED lighting, custom sconces, large walk-in his/her California Closet, and a terrace just off the main sleeping area. The Main Bathroom Suite features a tiled shower with angular body sprays & glass doors, a full-length mirror, LED lighting & sconces over the vanity, granite countertops, a tiled vanity wall, and decorative basket weave floor tile. Bedroom #2 is presently being used as a guest room and office space with great natural light and amazing water views with access to a terrace to step away from work for an outdoor breather or just to take in the beautiful days or starlit nights. Bedroom #3 is large in scale, has hardwood floors, large windows overlooking the city, window seating with excellent natural light, and custom overhead lighting, and is just across the hall from full bathroom #2 which also houses a brand new stackable full-sized washer and dryer. The guest Powder Room does not disappoint with its modern design featuring a glass bowl sink, sleek vanity, and decorative tile flooring. The gourmet kitchen features granite counters, marble subway backsplash, under-cabinet lighting, a bar nook, wine rack, brand new sto,ve and a private terrace. The Main Living area is the true definition of a free-flowing, open-floor concept. With continued uniformed hardwood flooring, the combo living area features an in-wall electric fireplace, crown molding with cove lighting, overhead LED lighting, window seating and breathtaking wrap-around views of the waterfront, PA, NJ and the famous Philadelphia skyline. Exit the main living area via sliding glass doors to a large terrace where you can entertain friends and family with views that cannot be replicated elsewhere in the city. Dockside has 24 hour gated security and concierge plus VISITOR PARKING when you need it, a totally renovated clubroom with full kitchen and seating for personal use (can be rented for an event) or to just to change up your scenery. The indoor pool and hot tub is a dream, not to mention the state of the art gym and wrap around outdoor patio with tables and chairs that overlook the water and Center City. With three elevators, dedicated bike room storage, separate owners' storage, shuttle service and walkable to everything waterfront including Spruce Street Harbour Park, Liberty Pointe, Bluecross Riverrink, Independence Seaport Museum, the Chart House, Moshulu, Zahav, Old City, Society Hill and much more you will love city living at its finest. You will also appreciate being close to all major highways and bridges to get in and out of the city and to NJ as well as Philadelphia International Airport. Set up a private tour today.

description:

Off of the master you will find the crown of this jewel of a home in a roof deck perfect for relaxing and enjoying all of the wonderful changing seasons our city has to offer. title: NEW LISTING!*Fantastic LOCATION Historic-Detail RENOVATED Philly HOUSE
description:
Here's a great, uniquely-Philly house in a great neighborhood!
The house is a classic "trinity" house probably constructed in the late 1700s/early 1800s.
"Philadelphia "Trinity" Houses: Built 1703-1836 to house tradesmen and artisans, these small brick structures were built in the Georgian and Federal-style along a cobblestone street. The name trinity refers to the three-story vertical structure connected by a spiral staircase."
Sears Street @ S 3rd Street (very close to E Moyamensing Ave)
Pennsport / South Philly / Queen Village Adjacent, Philadelphia
This classic Philadelphia "trinity" house was COMPLETELY RENOVATED. Finishes are high-end and upscale. Important foundational components have been addressed too; there's a recently-installed roof, deck and paved backyard patio. Location? It's excellent! You're really close & equidistant from South Street and the Italian Market. So if you like biking or walking, this house is an excellent fit. Otherwise, there's lots of on-street parking immediately accessible.
Monthly Rent: $1695 for leases starting on or November 16
Utilities: Gas, Electric & Water on your own meters.
Lease:	1 year lease required w/detailed agreement.
Move-in:	1st month, last month + security.
Pets:	Cat OK (and maybe a small dog) with pet addendum & fee.
Exterior Front: Steel front door with privatized leaded-glass detail. All front windows have been "capped" to reduce drafts. New house number, front light and railing.
Living Room: Enter directly into the compact living room featuring newly installed recessed lighting. There's a built-in closet directly ahead for storage. You can't miss the beautiful Caribbean Pine flooring. It starts at the front door and continues. . .
Kitchen: . . .into the kitchen. The entire first floor has hardwood flooring. On the way into the kitchen, you'll see the entrance to the basement (and stairs to the 2nd floor) to your left. A modern Italian-tiled "feature" wall wraps around the right-side entrance to the kitchen and faces the kitchen door. The kitchen cabinets are bright white w/stainless trimming and handles. Mini-subway tiles and black glass serve as the backsplash above a black granite countertop. Modern appliances including a compact dishwasher and gas stove.
Patio/Backyard: The backyard was dug out to uncover a ground drain, then completely resurfaced. The back wall has been painted. A new wooden fence was installed on the west side of the patio, including a gate leading to a side walkway to the front street (great for taking out trash and storing your bike).
Bathroom (2nd floor): Original circular wood stairs lead up to 2nd floor hall w/original hardwood plank flooring. Full bathroom at the front of the house with upgraded fixtures. . . even the bathtub. The bathtub "surround" is completely tiled with white marble. More modern Italian porcelain tile on the floor. Full-glass medicine cabinet and modern vanity. Chrome bath hardware.
Bedroom (2nd floor): Our contractor installed unique random-width plank flooring including all American hardwoods -- white oak, red oak, hickory and cherry. There's a built-in closet for clothing. A sliding fabric-panel system opens to reveal a large deck exclusively accessible from this bedroom.
Third floor: Climb another set of circular steps to the top floor, where you'll find a second bedroom w/new exotic-wood laminate flooring. The ceiling is super high, with painted beam struts and modern glass and stainless fixtures. There's another small room on the third floor, too -- great as a computer room, home office, extra large walk-in closet, etc.
Basement: Unfinished with your own washer & dryer + storage space!
Location, location, location:
Location is excellent. You're really close/equidistant to Queen Village and the Italian Market. Just a few blocks south of Washington Avenue, right off one of Queen Village's main North/South thoroughfares, E Moyamensing Avenue.
Great spot for biking and walking!
Herman's Coffee is 1/2 block away. Jaxx Steaks & Taproom, Pennsport Beer Boutique and Aroma on 3rd are around the corner.

Cute Southbrook Park Rehab! Come see this. Walk in to a large living room/dining room combo with new hardwood floors, coat closet, and freshly painted walls throughout the home. The kitchen has been revamped and features new gorgeous granite countertops, new hardwood floors and cabinets that have been beautifully refinished. Plenty of counter top and cabinet space. Check out the modern tile backsplash and stainless steel appliances including refrigerator, gas range and sink. Huge yard! New rear painted exterior and rear siding gives the back a breath of fresh air! Basement is large and unfinished with sound systems and washer/dryer. The second floor features two nice-sized bedrooms with closets and hardwood floors. The classic pink bathroom has been restored with a new toilet, sink, and refinished tub. This house features tons of nice natural light and plenty of windows! Come see it! One owner is a licensed PA Real Estate Agent. Cats and Small dogs under 25 lbs. are ok. with a non-refundable Pet Fee. Tenant pays gas, electric, cold water/sewer, and cable/internet. 1st, last and security due at lease signing. 1 year lease minimum. $75 non refundable application fee with two paystubs/some form of income verification and photo ID - we run a credit, criminal and eviction check. For gross monthly income, we look for 3x the rent. If approved, you will be charged a document preparation fee of $100.00. THIS FEE IS NON-REFUNDABLE. Each resident over the age of 18 must submit a separate rental application.. Available November 1, 2022! Contact Mike Giordano at  show contact info
!

title: Renovated 1 BR Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Near Restaurants
description:
The home at 915 is available for lease at this moment! This 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 9th floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as October 20, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Venditore by Giordano, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Whole Foods, or Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, rag & bone, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, and Marine Layer. Have breakfast, bruch, lunch or dinner at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, Marathon on the Square, a.kitchen, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, and Veda. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Nook Bakery & Coffee Bar, Elixr, K'Far, and Di Bruno Bros. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in French ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury. Stroll across the park and then grab a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:

* Dishwasher

* White kitchen cabinets
